name: DrkTar
description:
This is a game/engine demo for Squared Tower's latest project: 'DrkTar'

-------------------------------------------------------------

Content Warning:
This demo contains the following:
- Depictions of blood/organs.
- Imagery/Sounds relating to mental health/suicide.

-------------------------------------------------------------

Important Note:
This game is in super early development and this demo is mostly to show off some of the skills developed by Squared Tower since the release of The Space Game Redux.

The demo in it's current state was conceived and created in under a month.

-------------------------------------------------------------
